name: Troglomics, caveman adventures
description:
Troglomics is a strategy game combining simple and original gameplay with large doses of caveman humor to offer a game experience that will have you hooked on every challenge, each more difficult than the last.

EASY TO PLAY
Behind its high playability, and a set of controls that are ideally suited for touch screen devices, there lies a very real challenge with a very tight difficulty curve. Can you get 3 stars on every level?

CRUSH THOSE CAVEMEN!
Discover the special features and unique talents of each caveman that will help you win crazy, fun-filled battles where anything can happen.

STRATEGY IS THE KEY
In order to complete each level, you'll have to think hard about which cavemen you send into combat before you lead them through battle and on to victory.

HAVE FUN IN CREATIVE MODE
Each completed level unlocks new elements for you to enjoy as you try out crazy things in creative mode. Just for fun!

THE VERY LATEST IN PREHISTORIC HUMOR
Who said cavemen battles were serious? We weren't there, but we've used our very creative minds to imagine what these battles were like, so be prepared.
